article_text:
Synchrony Financial, the consumer finance business being split off from General Electric Co., on Friday said profit grew 4.7% in its third quarter as purchase volumes increased.

The company earlier this week won approval from the Federal Reserve to split off from GE, clearing the business to operate as a publicly owned savings and loan holding...

twitter.title: Synchrony Financial Profit Grows 4.7%
